binance 0.0.5

    Search P2P

    p2p_search.Rd

    Search P2P

    p2p_search(coin, fiat, side, pay_types = c(), page = NA, rows = 10)

    Arguments

    coin

    Coin.

    fiat

    Fiat currency.

    side

    Side of the trade: "BUY" or "SELL".

    pay_types

    Options for payment. One or more of "BANK", "WECHAT" or "ALIPAY". The default, c(), allows all payment options.

    page

    Page number. If NA then get all pages.

    rows

    Number of records per page.

    Value

    A data frame.

    Examples

    # Grab the first page.
p2p_search("ETH", "USD", side = "BUY", page = 1)
#> # A tibble: 10 × 10
#>    advert_id   side  asset fiat  price avail…¹ min_a…² max_a…³ advert…⁴ payment 
#>    <chr>       <chr> <chr> <chr> <dbl>   <dbl>   <dbl>   <dbl> <list>   <list>  
#>  1 1129083933… BUY   ETH   USD   1579.   0.719      15   1136. <tibble> <tibble>
#>  2 1138106945… BUY   ETH   USD   1582.   0.178      50    282. <tibble> <tibble>
#>  3 1137301378… BUY   ETH   USD   1586.   0.100      15    159. <tibble> <tibble>
#>  4 1126096695… BUY   ETH   USD   1588.   0.963      20   1200  <tibble> <tibble>
#>  5 1137052920… BUY   ETH   USD   1609.   1.44      100    800  <tibble> <tibble>
#>  6 1129765356… BUY   ETH   USD   1621.   0.410      50    600  <tibble> <tibble>
#>  7 1134948811… BUY   ETH   USD   1635.   0.821      50   1342. <tibble> <tibble>
#>  8 1138268563… BUY   ETH   USD   1641.   0.141      10    231. <tibble> <tibble>
#>  9 1137959366… BUY   ETH   USD   1650    8.85       50   7500  <tibble> <tibble>
#> 10 1137138548… BUY   ETH   USD   1656.   0.699      11   1157. <tibble> <tibble>
#> # … with abbreviated variable names ¹​available, ²​min_amount, ³​max_amount,
#> #   ⁴​advertiser
# Grab all pages.
p2p_search("BUSD", "CAD", side = "BUY")
